Grid

Required files

SCSS files required: _objects.grid.scss

Grid system

This grid system uses flexbox and flexbox grid mixins.

The grid file objects.grid.scss includes 12 column sizes at small, medium and large breakpoints. 2% is the default gutter and can be changed in the grid settings file settings.grid.scss

If you are not using this for your project or require a more simplified version, it may be more beneficial to not include the file and create your own grid system using the objects.grid.scss as a guide as well as any more options from the flexbox grid mixins.

For more info on how to configure your own grids see the docs here

Basic fluid grid

The container requires the class .grid and each grid column requires a class starting with .grid__col- plus the relevant column number width eg. .grid__col-12 for full width and .grid__col-6 for half width.

12

6

Responsive fluid grid - stacks on mobile

To make the columns stack to be full width on mobile, the full width column class needs to be applied to all columns grid__col-12 and then a breakpoint class with the required width eg. grid__col-md-6.

12

Responsive fluid grid - changes at different breakpoints

There are 3 more breakpoint classes available for the column widths sm, md, lg.

The below example illustrates all 4 breakpoint classes being applied.
